Lyric:
[by:人终归于尘土]
[00:14.60]I'm lying alone with my head on the phone
[00:19.36]Thinking of you till it hurts
[00:23.96]I know you hurt too but what else can we do
[00:28.47]Tormented and torn apart
[00:33.22]I wish I could carry your smile in my heart
[00:37.96]For times when my life seems so low
[00:42.31]It would make me believe what tomorrow could bring
[00:46.95]When today doesn't really know, doesn't really know
[00:54.14]I'm all out of love, I'm so lost without you
[00:58.87]I know you were right, believing for so long
[01:03.66]I'm all out of love, what am I without you
[01:08.20]I can't be too late to say that I was so wrong
[01:14.42]
[01:17.50]I want you to come back and carry me home
[01:22.15]Away from these long, lonely nights
[01:26.93]I'm reaching for you, are you feeling it too?
[01:31.21]Does the feeling seem oh, so right?
[01:36.06]And what would you say if I called on you now
[01:40.71]And said that I can't hold on?
[01:45.23]There's no easy way, it gets harder each day
[01:49.82]Please love me or I'll be gone, I'll be gone
[01:57.06]I'm all out of love, I'm so lost without you
[02:01.80]I know you were right, believing for so long
[02:06.46]I'm all out of love, what am I without you
[02:11.07]I can't be too late to say that I was so wrong
[02:17.60]
[02:20.66]Uuh, what are you thinking of
[02:27.37]What are you thinking of
[02:32.28]What are you thinking of
[02:36.99]What are you thinking of
[02:41.76]
[02:53.06]I'm all out of love, I'm so lost without you
[02:57.86]I know you were right, believing for so long
[03:02.46]I'm all out of love, what am I without you
[03:07.00]I can't be too late to say that I was wrong
[03:11.87]I'm all out of love, I'm so lost without you
[03:16.30]I know you were right, believing for so long
[03:20.98]I'm all out of love, what am I without you
[03:25.72]I can't be too late to say that I was so wrong
[03:32.76]
